metadata.description: Based on the hit animated TV series BATMAN: THE BRAVE AND THE BOLD, this all-ages title guest-stars DC heroes including Superman, Wonder Woman, The Flash, Captain Marvel, Martian Manhunter and more!  The Caped Crusader and his friends are back in action, bringing you even more heroic tales based on the hit Cartoon Network series!
metadata.name: The All-New Batman: The Brave and the Bold
